resources.string: Developer option is disabled. Please enable it in device info settings.
Developer option is not enabled and failed to open device info settings!
Quick Settings is not enabled as an accessibility service and failed to open settings!
Quick Settings is not enabled as an accessibility service. Please enable it in settings.

Accessibility service is required to:
1. Lock the screen
2. Take screenshots
3. Open power menu
And more!
Autostart settings not found! Please file an issue with your device model and operating system version.
Please grant \'Nearby devices\' permission for Quick Settings app in Settings.
